title: Get an Instant Form lead or a direct message lead

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: lead_source
parameters.description: The source of the leads. Enum values: INSTANT_FORM : leads generated through an Instant Form. DIRECT_MESSAGE : leads generated from direct messages of the associated Business Account.

parameters.name: advertiser_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when the leads are under an ad account. Advertiser ID.

parameters.name: library_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when the leads are under a form library of a Business Center. ID of a form library. To obtain the list of form libraries within a Business Center, use /page/library/get/ .

parameters.name: page_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when lead_source is INSTANT_FORM . Not supported when lead_source is DIRECT_MESSAGE . The page ID of an Instant Form. To obtain a list of Instant Forms, use /page/get/ and set business_type to LEAD_GEN .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: lead_data
fields.description: The lead data. Note : The data within this object depends on the questions that you have set in the Instant Form or the questions collected in the direct message lead.

fields.name: lead_source
fields.description: The source of the lead. Enum values: INSTANT_FORM : a lead generated through an Instant Form. DIRECT_MESSAGE : a lead generated from a direct message of the associated Business Account.

fields.name: page_id
fields.description: Returned only when lead_source is INSTANT_FORM . The page ID of the Instant Form.

fields.name: create_time
fields.description: The time when the lead was created, in the format of YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (UTC+0 time). Example: 2025-01-01 00:00:01 .
